title: Fool #2 Opens, Thanksgiving Stories, Snoop Dogg, Giveaway, Jill Scott, Michelle Obama, NFL Picks Junior, Bed Story, Tommy Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Fool #2 Opens, Thanksgiving Stories, Snoop Dogg, Giveaway, Jill Scott, Michelle Obama, NFL Picks Junior, Bed Story, Tommy Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Uncle Steve is with us in spirit and Fool #2 opens the show. The crew share their family Thanksgiving stories. Snoop Dogg finally gets his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. The Steve Harvey Morning Show will be doing its annual Turkey Giveaway this coming Monday and Tuesday. Jill Scott has some crazy mic skills to say the least. Michelle Obama has book signing dates and we have playback from when she called into the show. Junior will cover NFL picks and does his Sports Talk. There will be an auction for beds that your favorite celebrities have slept in this weekend in Indiana. Fool #1 is thankful and does today's Closing Remarks and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
